executable.title: Concatenation of two deformation field volumes or average of multiple deformation field volumes

parameters.label: Transform Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters used to choose the transform between concatenation and average

string-vector.name: deffieldtoconcatenate
string-vector.label: Set the two Deformation Field Volumes to concatenate

string-vector.name: typeOfField
string-vector.label: Set if the deformation field is an "h-Field" or a "displacement" in the same order as you enter your deformation field volumes to average or to concatenate

parameters.label: Output parameters
parameters.description: Ouput parameters: choose outputHfield if you want a concatenation, choose outputHfieldAvg if you want an average

image.name: outputHfield
image.label: Save the concatenation of deformation field volumes
image.description: Save transform as an HField (3D vector image containing vectors with 3 components)

image.name: outputHfieldAvg
image.label: Save the average of deformation field volumes
image.description: Save transform as an HField (3D vector image containing vectors with 3 components)
